Description: Red pottery ostracon, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip, with remains of seven lines of Latin text - a receipt by Cneius Arpenus for grease and tar supplied by Apion.
Curator's comments: Bernini, Andrea, Una ricevuta latina su ostracon: O.Brit.Mus. Inv. EA 29745, in: Zeitschrift fuer Payrologie und Epigraphik 212 (2019), 224–230.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389951) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389951)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
